name: Swift Kitsune Shapechanger
text: You can change shape more quickly than most kitsune.
benefit: You can assume human or kitsune form as a swift action. If you have the Fox Shape feat, you can assume fox form as a swift action as well.
normal: A kitsune’s change shape ability is a standard action.
text_zh: 你可以比大多数狐妖更快地变身。
benefit_zh: 你可以以迅捷动作在人类和狐妖形态之间变化，如果你有狐身专长，你也一样可以以迅捷动作进行狐身变化。
normal_zh: 一个狐妖需要一个标准动作完成变身。
special_zh: 狐妖可以在任何获得专长的时候选择此专长。
